actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to establish a National Commission on the Visual Arts, to require payments to the Commission by certain sellers of works of visual art, to establish in the Treasury a Visual Arts Fund, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Visual Artists' Residual Rights Act - Establishes the National Commission on the Visual Arts. Requires the seller of a work of visual art, sold in interstate or foreign commerce, for $1,000 or more, to pay five percent of the sale price to the Commission. Requires such seller to file with the Commission a statement describing the work sold, and stating the amount of money and the fair market value of property taken in payment. Sets forth civil penalties for failure to make the payments or file the reports required by this Act. Entitles the artist of such work to certain payments by the Commission. Establishes in the Treasury a visual arts fund.

titles.title: A bill to establish a National Commission on the Visual Arts, to require payments to the Commission by certain sellers of works of visual art, to establish in the Treasury a Visual Arts Fund, and for other purposes.
